name: BrandonConnect
0:
”Alexa, set the bedroom to 72 degrees”
”Alexa, turn on the kitchen lights”
”Alexa, lower the living room shades”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This skill can only be used with the requisite hardware and agreed licensing model. Contact www.BrandonSystems.com

Requirements:
- Supported Home Automation System
- Device configuration by Home Automation vendor
- User account registration.


Installation:
1. Set up Home Automation Configuration.
2. Enable the Brandon Connect skill in the Amazon Alexa app.
3. Log in with you Brandon Connect username and password.
4. Ask Alexa to "Discover devices", all smart home devices configured will be found.

Examples:
Thermostat
"Alexa, what's the room temperature"
"Alexa, set the room to 72 degrees"

Light
"Alexa, turn on the lights"
"Alexa, set the lights to 50%"

Shade Control
"Alexa, lower the shades"
"Alexa, set the shades to 50%"
